*gen_grbl.machineDescription: Use this if you have a GRBL machine

settings.gcodeStart:
G21         ; Set units to mm
G90         ; Absolute positioning
M4 S0       ; Enable Laser (0 power)
settings.gcodeMillStart:
G21         ; Set units to mm
G90         ; Absolute positioning
M3 S0       ; Enable Spindle (0 power)

*gen_smoothie.machineDescription: Use this if you have a SMOOTHIE machine

settings.gcodeStart:
G21         ; Set units to mm
G90         ; Absolute positioning
settings.gcodeMillStart:
G21         ; Set units to mm
G90         ; Absolute positioning
